newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Elsevier to take stake in Swiss publisher.
newsitem.headline: Elsevier to take stake in Swiss publisher.

text.p: Anglo-Dutch publishing group Reed-Elsevier said on Wednesday it had reached agreement to take a 40 percent stake in Stampfle Verlag, a privately-owned Swiss legal publisher.
"We've reached agreement to take the stake. When that will be completed is not year clear," said Reed-Elsevier finance director Fokko Covers. He declined to give financial details.

Stampfle publishes in German and Covers said Reed-Elsevier was keen to expand in German-language publishing. "We have plans for more acquisitions in the German-speaking area," he said, declining to elaborate.
